content.description: This class is centered on the exploration of rhythmic practices and organizational principles in a wide variety of musical contexts: West African Drumming, European Classical Music, Caribbean Traditional Music, American Pop Music, Jazz and Contemporary Experimental Music. The course will toggle between two major components: 1 - ""Hands-On"" performance practice 2 - Analysis and comparison of organizational principles of rhythm in a variety of musical traditions.
content.name: Practices and Principles of Rhythm
